workerManagerResourceSpotAllocation

Interface IResourceManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MineralPatchManager, RefineryManager, ResourceManager

    public interface IResourceManager
    IResourceManager.java --- Interface that each resource manager must implement in order to be used in the WorkerManagerResourceSpotAllocation instance.
    Author:
    P H - 03.09.2017

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addToManager(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
      Function for adding a ResourceManagerEntry to a resource manager.
      int getAvailableSpace()
      Function for retrieving the number of assignable space that the manager currently has.
      bwapi.Unit getGatheringSource(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
      Function for retrieving the internally assigned gathering source of the specified ResourceManagerEntry.
      boolean isSpaceAvailable()
      Function defining if space is available in the resource manager or if no more Units can be added towards it.
      boolean removeFromManager(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
      Function for removing a ResourceManagerEntry from a resource manager.

    • Method Detail

      • isSpaceAvailable

        boolean isSpaceAvailable()
        Function defining if space is available in the resource manager or if no more Units can be added towards it.
        Returns:
        true if Units can be added towards the resource manager or false if not space is available.

      • getAvailableSpace

        int getAvailableSpace()
        Function for retrieving the number of assignable space that the manager currently has.
        Returns:
        the number of Units that can be added towards the resource manager.

      • addToManager

        boolean addToManager(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for adding a ResourceManagerEntry to a resource manager. The Unit is then assigned a gathering spot internally.
        Parameters:
        entry - the Unit that is going to be added towards a resource manager.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit was assigned towards a resource manager, false if not.

      • removeFromManager

        boolean removeFromManager(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for removing a ResourceManagerEntry from a resource manager.
        Parameters:
        entry - the Unit that is going to be removed from a resource manager.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit was successfully removed, false if it was not removed or not found.

      • getGatheringSource

        bwapi.Unit getGatheringSource(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for retrieving the internally assigned gathering source of the specified ResourceManagerEntry.
        Parameters:
        entry - the Unit that was previously added towards a resource manager and therefore must be assigned towards a gathering spot.
        Returns:
        the gathering spot (Unit) that the ResourceManagerEntry was assigned to internally ny the resource manager.
